board.check_lobby_tip: This button is only to see the lobby temporarily while NOT leaving this game. 'Back to Game' button appears at the top right corner in the Lobby.
board.load_disabled: This button is only for the host player in STUDY Room.
board.replay_tip: Replay/analyze only on own PC. The board is not shared unless you are the host of post-game discussion.
board.listen_tip: Latest position is shown when watching; and host's board is shown in post-game. Arrows will be also shared.

option.byoyomi_noto: yetAnother 萌えるチェスクロ voice sample
option.board_size_tip: You can also change the whole app size freely by the zoom function of web browsers with Ctrl-key + mouse wheel.
option.past_games: Number of past games to be analyzed
option.study_level_tip:
[Level 0]　I never do it online.
[Level 1]　I don't do it very often, but I'd basically do it if the opponent wants to.
[Level 2]　I like post-game analysis. I always want to do it as far as the opponent agrees to.
option.english_level_tip:
[Level 0]　No English!
[Level 1]　My English is bad, but I could try and do it a little bit.
[Level 2]　I can basically communicate in English without big problem. (Or higher)

pass_invalid: Wrong password. Cannot enter the room.

msg.html5_initial: Welcome to HTML5 beta version. The available functions are still limited; no study mode and tournament support. If you find any bug, please report to info@81dojo.com.
msg.game_start: Make kind greetings when starting and ending the game. The best way to improve your skill is Postgame Analysis. (However, it is not against manners to skip the analysis and leave immediately after exchanging greeting.)
msg.mute_chat: You are receiving watcher's chat as this game is non-rated. (Switch off the checkbox above the wathcer list to disable it.)
msg.password_encrypted: Password will be encrypted while being sent to the server.
msg.newlogin:
- Double click names to see Player Info. (Also [***] in chat window)
- Double click games to watch.
- Play 5 rated games against someone whose rating is already fixed, and your rating will be determined!
- If the registered rating was much lower than your actual strength, you must reset properly.
- You can register only your home country or residing country.
msg.guestlogin:
- The orange ◆ mark on the Player List on the left indicates your guest account.
- To watch a game and view a player's info, please double-click on the lists.
- Guests can only use limited functions of 81Dojo. Please see the comparison table between a guest and a registered player. --> http://81dojo.com/documents/Guest_Login_System
msg.host: You are the host of Study Mode. Your board is shared.
msg.subhost: You are a sub-host of study mode. You can move the host's pieces.
msg.subhost_given: You are given Study sub-host status. You can move the host's pieces.
msg.study_notify: Study-position is changed. Back to [Follow latest position] mode to update.
msg.rated:
This game is Rated.
Players CANNOT see watcher's chat until the game ends.
Watcher can PM to players, but it will be notified to others.
msg.nonrated:
This game is Non-rated.
Players CAN see watcher's chat by default. (Player can switch it off.)
msg.opponent_disconnect: Opponent disconnected. You can declare win after 60 seconds, or keep waiting. However, you will be forced to win automatically after 300 seconds.
msg.disconnect_self: You are disconnected from the server. The applet is no longer active. Please reload the applet to login again and continue.　Do you want to reload immidately?
msg.lag: Your timer is lagging by more than 5 sec due to CPU load. Time-up loss can occur earlier than your timer hits zero.
msg.addlist: Added to the list temporarily. Go to Option Window to set it permanent or cancel.
msg.addlist_favorite: Added to the favorite list temporarily. Go to Option Window to set it permanent or cancel.
msg.addlist_block: Blocked all communication from the user. This setting will be canceled on your next login.
msg.auto_reject: Further challenges from this user will be automatically rejected. This setting will be canceled on your next login.
msg.before_upgrade: You have a chance of rank promotion now. Win against someone who has a fixed rating higher than (yours - 200), and you will be promoted.
msg.before_downgrade: Your rating is at the bottom of the rank now. You may be demoted if you lose the next game.
msg.guest_expire: The number of games played per day has reached the limit. Please register an account (free of charge) to continue playing.
msg.reconnect_only:
You can only recconect to the game you disconnected from.
If your game had already ended, re-login to clear your 'D' status.
msg.suggest_invitation: Opponent is not waiting for a game. Invite to your game?
msg.mobile: This function is invalid for this user testing the mobile app.

code.E010: The user is not logged in. The message was saved for his/her next login.
code.E018: Database update failed. (Please contact the support.)
code.C000: The opponent is in challenge/invite process with someone else.
code.C001: Cannot start games. Server maintenance will be held soon.
code.C002: The opponent is already starting a game.
code.C003: The opponent did not respond within time limit.
code.C006: You cannot challenge until you exit the current game.
code.C008: Opponent has already started game with another player.
code.C012: is in challenge/invite process with someone else.
code.C013: did not respond within time limit.
code.C020: declined the invitation. (Waiting for someone else)
code.C021: The opponent rejected your challenge. (Temporarily busy)
code.C022: The opponent rejected your challenge. (Rating is out of preferred range)
code.C023: The opponent rejected your challenge. (Waiting for someone else)
code.C030: The selected rule has been canceled.
code.G014: is playing with blind pieces, Middle.
code.G015: is Playing with blind pieces, Hard.
code.G016: is Playing with blind pieces, Extreme.
code.G020: will be promoted if he wins this game.
code.G021: will be demoted if he loses this game.
code.P000: has sent a PM to the opponent.
code.T000: Which position could've been the key point?
code.T001: Excuse me, but I will leave now.
code.T002: Thank you for the game. Have a nice day.
code.T003: Could we analyze from the beginning?
code.T004: Could we analyze a little bit?
code.T005: What could've been the right move here?
code.T007: This position seems better for me.
code.T010: This position seems not easy for me.
code.T011: This position seems bad for me.
code.T012: Excuse me for interrupting the analysis, but I have to leave now.
code.T013: It's about time I'll be leaving.
code.V003: Requesting to connect to public voice-chat...
code.V004: Sent request to players to access their post-game voice-chat.
code.E007: You cannot start another game until you exit the current game room.
